author: ceki
msg: Modified the test cases to work with junit 3.7. The test
will no longer work with junit 3.2.

author: ceki
msg: We no longer need build.sh and build.bat scripts.

author: ceki
msg: The path to jar files are now set using a build.property file
instead of the CLASSPATH env variable. There is also no need for
the build.sh and build.bat scripts. They will be removed a bit later.

author: ceki
msg: icon/ directory is no longer in use
